## ContextObserverFn type

Listen on `bind`<!-- -->, `unbind`<!-- -->, or other events

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ContextObserverFn = (eventType: ContextEventType, binding: Readonly<Binding<unknown>>, context: Context) => ValueOrPromise<void>;
```
